attributes.action: Remove MBW Traing from the goverment contract for new deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that MBW Traing be removed from the goverment contract for new deal.  As they have complete disregard for their customers safety, can not find suitable work placements to assist the jobseeker and seem to think that they can get away with bullying people into work placements that they cannot do.
